title: (x) serif face on Strathmore paper promotion - Miller Display {Chris Keegan}
content:
thanks in advance. here’s the sample. cheers,

nick cottrell

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20080706170638im_/http:/www.typophile.com/files/hello_4353.png)

 [‹ (x) Pipeline italic serif face - Palatino {Marc O}](http://web.archive.org/web/20080706170638/http:/www.typophile.com/node/31840 "Go to previous forum topic") [(x) Caring Hands Animal Hospital serif face - Lo-Type {Mike Y} ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20080706170638/http:/www.typophile.com/node/31806 "Go to next forum topic")
author: istitch

comments.content: where did this sample come from?.... do you have a url for the link?

it’s from a Strathmore paper promotion...

sorry, but there’s no link.

———

Hi guys:

Chris Keegen\> looks like you’ve got it!

Nick\> I forgot how beautiful the Strathmore paper kits looks. At the Guttenburg show in Long Beach the Kelly Paper Booth has tons of these lovely samples from all the paper mills... I’m in the mood for ordering samples now.

Mikey
oh where do we order samples at?

gracias to all for responding. i certainly agree that this is a beautiful piece : )

[here’s](http://web.archive.org/web/20080706170638/http:/strathmore.com/index2.html) a link to the Strathmore site. there should be some info on how to order some samples.

hope you are all well...

———  
nick
thats a nice site, anyone know who designed it?

i’m late on this one, but we did it at vsa partners  
it’s miller display with miller text thrown in for the knocked out parts  
the book is so super nice
jackson... better late than never, your work is stunning!!!! Mikey
aw, you can direct all praise to nichole guy who was the one with the the real design talent.
Strathmore has fabulous papers — I just finished editioning a book on Aquarius and love working with it.
very cool, what was the book about? Do you have any photos?
